title: Netflix clone project
description: This project is a replica of the popular streaming service, Netflix, created using modern web development technologies. I focussed on creating a sleek and intuitive UI that mimics the original Netflix layout, enhancing user experience.

title: Form Validation project
description: This project implements a simple form validation using JavaScript. It ensures that user inputs are correct when the Register button is clicked. If any inputs are incorrect, clear red text appears to inform the user about the specific errors, guiding them to correct the information before submission.

title: Responsive Website project
description: This modern travel website was created using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, featuring consistent branding colors for a fresh look. It includes interactive elements and clear calls to action, enhancing user engagement and making it easy for visitors to explore and book their next adventure.
